```{r}

```

# Goldfeld-Quandt Test

```{r}
library(car)
head(Prestige)
model <- lm(prestige~education + women + income, data = Prestige)
au.wom <- auditor(model, variable = "women")
au.wom
au.edu <- auditor(model, variable = "education")
au.edu
```

Let's see it on plots.


```{r}
plot_test_gq(au.edu)
plot_test_gq(au.wom)
```
